types.name: personal
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations

types.name: professional
types.description: Fireworks only to be used by certified fireworks display professionals

types.name: level 1
types.description: Demolition explosives that require a Level 1 certification to be used for small demolition projects

types.name: level 2
types.description: Demolition explosives that require a Level 2 certification to be used
